biotools.summary: This tool uses a structural alphabet of short structural motifs to compare protein structures. It uses as its structural alphabet a set of protein blocks derived from structurally aligned homologous proteins present in the PALI Database.

bioschemas.name: PBE
bioschemas.summary: This tool uses a structural alphabet of short structural motifs to compare protein structures. It uses as its structural alphabet a set of protein blocks derived from structurally aligned homologous proteins present in the PALI Database.
